Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris.

Motivated Software Engineering senior student at the University of Information Technology. Passionate about solving problems, developing and launching new projects. Seeking beginner opportunities to enhance my knowledge, nurture my proactive mindset, and thrive in the field.

• Languages & Scripting:
Dart, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, C++, C#, Java
 • Frameworks & Libraries: 
Reactjs, Redux, Vuejs, Flutter, DirectX9, Android, React Native
 • Operating Systems:
Windows and Linux
 • Databases:
MS SQL, MySQL, SQLite
 • Analysis and Design Tools:
diagrams.net (draw.io)
 • Methodologies:
Agile, Scrum, Waterfall
 • Other technologies and skills:
Git, npm, UX/UI

• Teamwork and collaboration
 • Problem solving
 • Critical thinking
 • Adaptability
 • Empathy
 • Creativity
 • English

Expectation:
 • Working on challenging, interesting product which is being used worldwide
 • Be involved in the complete project lifecycle, from requirements to final delivery
 • Enhance knowledge, develop new skills and have fun

Key Responsibility
 • Supported RTA web application development, testing and maintenance.
 • Collaborated on RTA main products.
 • Managed and refined an incubation form-builder project.
 • Verified that software met requirements.
 Key Achievement
 • Redesigned the UI of the form-builder project.
 • Identified and fixed a bug which prevent the importing of exported data.
University of Information Technology - VNU HCM
Top 3 Software Engineering class of 2017 (High Quality program)
Thesis involves researching new technologies (Machine Learning, Data Science, …) and applying them to make a completed system (Product Recommender System).
Led several projects, tried adopting Scrum to manage recent game development project.

• Member of Content Department at UIT's Open English Club
 • Member of Board of Directors at UIT's Table Tennis Club.
 • Collaborator of Content and Learning Department at UEH's CFE.
 • Active MOOCs learner.
As a Software Engineering student, I\'ve done a wide range of projects on different platforms.\n Below are some important projects that I don\'t want you to miss.
